main event: A UFO sighting involving a star-shaped object that changed colors from red to green occurred in Muscatine, Iowa on August 26, 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 2 hours.,The object was observed to ascend and descend within a limited area.,Witnesses used binoculars for a clearer view of the object.,The UFO was reported to be stationary during the observation.,The conclusions regarding the object were varied, with possibilities including a balloon or an astronomical star.
witness description: witnesses included a state representative, a salesman, and a paint store manager
